content:
Join journalists from The Economist for the second annual Open Future Festival on Saturday, October 5th 2019. Held in three cities simultaneously—Hong Kong, Manchester and Chicago—it is a chance for people from across the ideological spectrum to meet and debate vital issues on the future of open societies.

Hear talks and panels by prominent figures from politics, business, civil society and the arts. The festival themes include free speech and free trade; the environment and inequality; the rise of populism and anxiety over the algorithmic society.

Come and share your ideas during a day of exciting discussions, curated content and exhibitions, immersive experiences and the chance to make connections with hundreds of festival attendees.

More information for the festivals by region:

Learn more about Open Future

ex: adj. [数] 算法的；规则系统的

wp.algorithmic approach: 算法逼近;算法途径;翻译
wp.algorithmic dispatching: 算法调度;算法调度英语;算法转接

eg2: Provides an algorithmic mechanism for identifying the fault.
提供一种识别故障的算法机制。
What is the distinction between algorithmic design and coding?
算法设计与编写代码之间有什么区别？
The transition from the biological to the algorithmic is achieved by translating connections into weights.
从生物学到算法的转换是通过 将连接转化为权重来实现的。

wp.anxiety reaction: 焦虑反应;焦虑;忧郁症;焦虑性的反应
wp.existential anxiety: 存在焦虑;存在的焦虑;存在性焦虑;生存焦虑
wp.Anxiety disorders: 焦虑症;焦虑障碍;焦虑性疾患;焦急症
wp.Death Anxiety: 死亡焦虑;死亡不安;对死亡的焦虑;对残死亡的焦虑
wp.Neurotic anxiety: 神经质焦虑;神经性焦虑
wp.trait anxiety: 特质焦虑;特质性焦虑;性格型焦虑;性格焦虑

ex: n. 焦虑；渴望；挂念；令人焦虑的事
eg2: Fear and anxiety were gnawing her.
恐惧与焦虑折磨着她。
His illness was aggravated by .
他的病情因焦虑而加重。
The student was tortured with .
这个学生为焦虑所苦。
As one attendee summed up, “Where have we come from?
就像一位与会者总结的，“我们从哪里来？
"All of us together, in that beautiful place, " one attendee recalls.
“我们聚在在那个美丽的地方，”一位出席聚会的员工回忆。
Another theme that came up -- and that, as one attendee pointed out, is of particular interest as colleges look for ways to cut costs -- is the value of counseling centers.
新的问题出现了，正如一位大会出席者指出的那样，由于各高校目前正在寻求方法消减开支，学校咨询中心就被首先考虑到了。

ex: v. 管理（博物馆或美术馆等的收藏品）
网络 副牧师；策展；助理教师

wp.ideological education: 思想教育;政治教育;思想政治教育;意识形态教育

ex: adj. 思想的；意识形态的
eg2: As to the ideological work， we should never go about impetuously.
对于思想工作， 千万不可操切从事。
In doing ideological work, one must suit one's methods to the situation.
做思想工作必须对症下药。
Despite their ideological problems, however, most of these protesters have been peaceful, which brings us to the next party to the drama that we certainly cannot cheer: the police.
虽然他们的意识形态有问题，但是，这些抗议者的绝大多数都是和平的，这就把我们带到这个事件中我们绝不赞赏的另一方：警察。

wp.clausius inequality: 克劳修斯不等式;克劳休斯不等式
wp.absolute inequality: 绝不等式;绝对不均等线;		绝对不等式;毫不等式
wp.social inequality: 社会不平等;社会不公;不平等;社会差等
wp.Chebyshev inequality: 比雪夫不等式;切比雪夫不等式;不等式;契比雪夫不等式

ex: n. 不平等；不同；不平均
eg2: If inequality were the problem, people would be less upset today than they were in 2007.
如果不平等是问题所在， 2007年的时候人们应该比今天更加愤怒。
Where I once saw only poverty, I learned to see systemic inequality and the possibility of change.
当我只看见贫困的时候，我也学着去发现体系的不平等和改变的可能性。

ex: n. 平民政治；民粹主义；民意论
网络 平民主义；民众主义；人民党主义

wp.prominent intellectuals: 高知识群体;高常识群体

ex: adj. 突出的，显著的；杰出的；卓越的
eg2: But I think the most  and visible change to the outside world is our release cycle.
但我认为对外界而言，最显著的、最能看到的变化是我们的发布周期。
In the process of practice it is not prominent this is because I should improve my English level.
但在实习的过程中这个优势却并不突出，这都是因为我的专业水平有待提高。
Of course, these individuals have been around since the beginning of human history and played a more prominent role in some eras than in others.
当然，这些个体自从人类历史开端以来就已经存在，并且在一些时代扮演着比另一些时代更突出的角色。
So we think they have to proceed , " she added.
因此，我们认为两个问题必须同时进行。
It will save considerable machining time to use more than one tool in one machine to perform several machine operations either in sequence or .
在一台机器上使用数种刀具来顺次或同时进行几项机器操作， 将节省大量加工时间。
If they have multiple test cases that will be run on the same platforms, they can select multiple configurations simultaneously and apply the configurations to several of them in batch mode.
如果他们拥有多个将要运行在同一个平台上的测试用例的话，那么他们能够同时选择多个配置，并且将这些配置批量应用到平台上。

ex: n. 频谱；范围；领域；序列
网络 光谱；波谱；系列
eg2: A spectrum is formed by a ray of light passing through a prism.
一束光通过棱镜就会形成光谱。
Red and violet are at opposite ends of the spectrum.
红色和紫色位于光谱的两端。
the electromagnetic/radio/sound spectrum
电磁波谱；射频频谱；声谱
a broad spectrum of interests
广泛的兴趣范围
We shall hear views from across the political spectrum.
我们要听取各个政治派别的看法。

wp.vital part: 要害部位;而防御面的重要区域;关键部位
wp.vital signs: 生命征象;生命体征;生命特征;主要病症
wp.vital spirit: 提出所谓生命的精气;生命灵气
wp.vital circuit: 安全电路;影响安全的电路
wp.vital energy: 生命力;中医学术语;生命能量;生命能
wp.vital component: 主要部件;重要组成部分;重要组分;至关重要的组成部分
wp.LELAN VITAL: 护甲油;晶莹闪烁指甲油;晶莹绚丽指甲油;星灿晶钻眼线液
wp.vital a: 重要的;重大的;致命的;有生命力的

ex: adj. 至关重要的；生死攸关的；有活力的
n. (Vital)人名；(法、德、意、俄、葡)维塔尔；(西)比塔尔
eg2: However, it is also vital that the infrastructure supports the substitution of one service implementation by another with no effect to the clients of that service.
然而，基础架构支持在不影响服务的客户端的情况下由另一个服务实现替代原有的服务实现也是至关重要的。
The testing of our plans, structures and responses to ensure they can deal with any incident is .
检测我们的方案、结构和反应以确保他们能处理任何事故，这是至关重要的。
This was ; I wanted other parents to be able to profit from our experience.
这是至关重要的，我希望其他的父母能够从我们的经验中收益。

Title: Join us for a day of ideas, debate and inspiration

paperStatistics.title: Join us for a day of ideas, debate and inspiration
